item.title: Easy Apple Pudding Recipe For 200 People
item.description: Delicious apple pudding for 200 people is a very popular dessertin the fall or for any season. Great for schools, churches and special functions. Apple Pudding for 200 People Ingredients Apple Base Ingredients 8 â€“ #10 cans sliced waterpack apples 16 c. sugar 16 tbs corn starch 8 tsp salt 8 tbs cinnamon Topping Ingredients 12 c. flour 5# butter, melted 5 c. brown sugar 2 tbs cinnamon 6 c.
